name: Treasure Hunt Ninja
description:
Treasure Hunt Ninja. Let's start your Ninja adventure here. Avoid obstacles along the way on your journey of treasure hunting. Use your sword to get rid of the dragons and piranha while collecting treasure and diamonds along the way. Use the keys to open doors to the next level, that way you will be able to play the next levels without unlocking them. The collected treasures and diamonds can be used to unlock more levels

Treasure Hunt Ninja is a Fun Free Game you have been looking for.
